info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:58PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Daniels and northeastern Valley Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 957 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles south of Richland, or 22 miles southeast of Opheim, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Richland, Port Of Opheim, Peerless, West Fork, Baylor, Glentana and Larslan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
